nodes.text: The Shak clan was a Twi'lek family on Ryloth.

In the early years of the New Republic, the Shak clan operated the Kala'uun Starport, from which they operated a number of illegal activities, including ryll scams and slave sales. Due to their ryll scams against the New Republic in 6 ABY, the clan was discredited and stripped of its prominence.
